Reviews.Title: Stay away from it, just junk!
Reviews.Author: leroy mcleod
Reviews.Content: This was a complete waste of money. I tried the baluns using Cat 5e but got no signal at all. As a test I connected a 5' patch cable and got picture and sound with a scrolling horizontal line, swapped the cable for another and saw no improvement. Returned item.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality items
Reviews.Author: Shawn
Reviews.Content: The units appear to be poor made; it stopped working after a week, I know there is at least one other review from someone with the quality problem, so this seem to be a reproducible problem. Save yourself some money and get better baluns from other sellers.
